channel.title: CiTR -- African Rythms
channel.description: AFRICAN RHYTHMS has been on the Air for over 12 yrs. Your Host David Love Jones plays playing a heavyweight selection of classics from the past present and future.. JAZZ, SOUL,HIP HOP, AFRO- LATIN ,FUNK ,ECLECTIC BRASILIAN RHYTHMS....Also presenting interviews with local and International Artists. Truly a Radio show with international flavor. david@africanrhythmsradio.com www.africanrhythimsradio.com
